paragraph.heading: 1 Call Stack Window
paragraph.paragraph:
During debugging, the Call Stack Window will be available, from which you may view the current call stack of the system. Below is a screenshot of the Call Stack Window:
Call Stack Debugging Window CallStackDebuggingWindow.png
This screenshot corresponds to system that has stopped in the creation
0 !DefaultAssociativeIndex Eiffel feature>feature of the
0 !DefaultAssociativeIndex Eiffel root class>Root Class as the Result of a
0 !DefaultAssociativeIndex Eiffel break points>Break point being reached. This is why there is only one entry in the list.
See Also
./index.xml Debugging
./LocalsWindow.xml Locals Window
./BreakPointWindow.xml Break Point Window
./WatchWindow.xml Watch Window
